name: Pycon Philippines
body:
### It's official, PyCon Philippines is happening

Want to speak or volunteer to help?  Contact one of the following people:

* Daniel Greenfeld - [@pydanny](http://twitter.com/pydanny) / pydanny (at) gmail {dot} com
* Audrey Roy - [@audreyr](http://twitter.com/audreyr) / audreyr (at) cartwheelweb {dot} com
* Frank Pohlmann - fpohlmann (at) googlemail {dot} com

### Schedule
TBD

### Location
Do you know of an office, university, or other location who can host 60-100 people over June 30-31, 2012?  Let us know.  

The venue host will receive thanks and worldwide recognition for being the 1st PyCon Philippines host and sponsor.

### How to add content to this website
Clone this repo and check out the gh-pages branch:

```
$ git clone git@github.com:audreyr/pycon-philippines.git
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

Make your changes, then submit a pull request.  Pull requests should be small and atomic, please.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
